text: Slättbergshallen is a sports venue in the town of Trollhättan in Sweden. It was opened on 14 November 2009. It consists of an ice skating and an indoor bandy venue and an indoor ice hockey rink. ==References== ==Other websites== * Slättbergshallen Category:Bandy in Sweden Category:Buildings and structures in Sweden Category:Sport in Trollhättan Category:2009 establishments in Sweden
title: Slättbergshallen
